questions.expect_ans: Travel through 3 regions of Vietnam with each region having fun games & activities where you can win stamps for your chance to a raffle entry!
questions.raffle: How do I enter the raffle?
questions.raffle_ans: Complete 3 region activities, collect stamps in your passport = raffle entry.
questions.prizes_ans: LEGO set, matcha kit, skincare bundle, disposable camera, snacks, coffee card.
